meanings.definition: To surpass in state or condition.
meanings.sent1: She outstates her classmates in academic performance.
meanings.sent2: The new technology outstates the old one in efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outstates the big elephant in carrying capacity.
meanings.sent4: His determination outstates any obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent5: The bright sun outstates the dim moon in lighting up the sky.

meanings.definition: To exceed in importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness outstates her intelligence in making a difference.
meanings.sent2: The safety of the passengers outstates the speed of the train.
meanings.sent3: The tiny seed outstates the giant tree in potential growth.
meanings.sent4: His generosity outstates his wealth in impact on others.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children outstates the silence of a library in joy.
